Name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 3 - Collector's Edition
About the game: In this hidden object game you can visit 9 European countries and search for interesting items in unforgettable old European towns and play a bunch of new mini games. You’ll visit Bullring in Seville, walk around La Rioja vineyards, see the ancient lighthouse San Sebastian in Spain and Theme park in Senlis, France. You’ll enjoy a walk in several national parks, go around Venice, experience the European music culture, have a look in luxurious casino in Monaco, visit two interesting museums, ancient castle and much more... - over 15 locations to search - find over 500 objects and a hidden raccoon in every level - play over 15 new mini-games - beautiful desktop wallpapers - an album with exclusive virtual postage stamps to collect
